Sentencas: A theoretical model was developed to study the electrical characteristics of a solid oxide steam electrolyzer (SOSE) for hydrogen production.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The activation and concentration overpotentials at the electrodes as well as the ohmic overpotential at the electrolyte were considered as the main sources of voltage loss.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The Butler-Volmer equation, Fick's model, and Ohm's law were applied to characterize the overpotentials.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The theoretical model was validated as the simulation results agreed well with the experimental data from the literature.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: In the study of the component thickness effect, anode-support SOSE configuration was identified as the most favorable design.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: Further parametric analyses were performed to study the effects of material properties and operating conditions on the anode-supported SOSE cell performance.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The results have shown that increasing electrode porosity and pore size can reduce the voltage loss.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: In the operation, both temperature and steam molar fraction can be increased to enhance the SOSE electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The pressure should be regulated depending on the current density.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The electrochemistry model can be used to perform more analyses to gain insightful understanding of the SOSE hydrogen production principles and to optimize the SOSE cell and system designs.
Titulo: Parametric study of solid oxide steam electrolyzer for hydrogen production
